Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Seminar \Sem`i*nar"\, n. [G. See {Seminary}, n.] A group of students engaged, under the guidance of an instructor, in original research in a particular line of study, and in the exposition of the results by theses, lectures, etc.; -- formerly called also {seminary}, now seldom used in this sense. [Webster 1913 Suppl. +PJC]
seminar n 1: any meeting for an exchange of ideas 2: a course offered for a small group of advanced students
